bdi4jade.preference

Class SoftgoalPreferences

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.util.MetadataElement
      • bdi4jade.belief.Belief<T>
        • bdi4jade.belief.TransientBelief<java.util.Map<Softgoal,java.lang.Double>>
          • bdi4jade.preference.SoftgoalPreferences
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    jade.content.Concept, jade.content.Term, java.io.Serializable

    public class SoftgoalPreferences
extends TransientBelief<java.util.Map<Softgoal,java.lang.Double>>
    This is an agent transient belief (@see TransientBelief) that stores the preferences for softgoals.
    Author:
    ingrid
